title: Wait, I'm a Zombie?
description: Peaches has been having a rough couple of weeks. First she dies, then she gets married to a vampire, and now she's reaching into dead people and eating them! Looks like the Disney World honeymoon's going to have to be put on the back burner.Peaches and Bane travel to Egypt to meet the merchants and find out who the mysterious person targeting Peaches is. But it's not all rainbows and assassination attempts, Peaches has to go to her coronation and be vetted as a queen. But in all the Vampire chaos, she'd still not sure what she is, and in an attempt to discover just that, she goes on a walkabout. But nowhere is safe for the new queen, and old friends start to look like new enemies. Dive into a world filled with mystery, danger, adventure, and tons of laughs as Peaches discovers that the most dangerous thing might just be not knowing if what she is might hurt the man she loves.
author: Rosi S. Phillips
